game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
game.desc: Forget everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games. Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series. Travel across vast fields, through forests, and to mountain peaks as you discover what has become of the kingdom of Hyrule in this stunning Open-Air Adventure. Now on Nintendo Switch, your journey is freer and more open than ever. Take your system anywhere, and adventure as Link any way you like.

game.name: Hyrule Warriors - Definitive Edition
game.desc: Race into the thick of battle as the mightiest legends of Hyrule in Hyrule Warriors: Definitive Edition. Slash through legions of enemies unleashing devastating blows worthy of Dynasty Warriors and dominate the battlefield as famous heroes from The Legend of Zelda series.

game.name: Rayman Legends - Definitive Edition
game.desc: Rayman, Globox, and the Teensies are off wandering through an enchanted forest when they discover a mysterious tent filled with a series of captivating paintings. As they look more closely, they notice each painting seems to tell the story of a mythical world. While focusing on a painting that shows a medieval land, they are suddenly sucked into the painting, entering the world, and the adventure begins. The gang must run, jump, and fight their way through each world to save the day and discover the secrets of every legendary painting.

game.name: New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe
game.desc:
Two Super Mario Bros. games in one, for double the fun!
Join Mario, Luigi, and pals for single-player or multiplayer fun anytime, anywhere! Take on two family-friendly, side-scrolling adventures with up to three friends* as you try to save the Mushroom Kingdom. Includes the New Super Mario Bros. U and harder, faster New Super Luigi U games—both of which include Nabbit and Toadette as playable characters!
Two games in one, for double the fun! Simple, straightforward controls, new playable characters optimized for younger and less-experienced players, and a wealth of bonus content—like a Hints gallery and helpful reference videos**—make this a perfect choice for anyone looking to introduce their family to the wonderful world of Mario. All a player needs is one Joy-Con™ controller, so two people can team up right out of the box! Tackle 164 platforming courses in the two main game modes and enjoy extra replayability with three additional game modes in which you can also play as a Mii™ character: Challenges, Boost Rush, and Coin Battle!

game.path: ./content/updates/The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild [01007EF00011E800][v720896].nsp
game.name: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild [01007EF00011E800][v720896]
Crash Team Racing: Nitro-Fueled
game.desc:
Crash is back in the driver’s seat! Get ready to go fur-throttle with Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled. It’s the authentic CTR experience plus a whole lot more, now fully-remastered and revved up to the max:
Start your engines with the original game modes, characters, tracks, power-ups, weapons and controls Power slide to glory in additional karts and tracks from beyond the original game Race online with friends and Crash the competition with online leaderboards
With Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled, the stakes are high and the competition is fierce. It's the CTR you love, now kicked into the highest gear.

game.name: Hyrule Warriors - Definitive Edition
game.desc: Race into the thick of battle as the mightiest legends of Hyrule in Hyrule Warriors: Definitive Edition. Slash through legions of enemies unleashing devastating blows worthy of Dynasty Warriors and dominate the battlefield as famous heroes from The Legend of Zelda series.

game.name: Kirby Star Allies
game.desc: When a new evil threatens Planet Popstar, Kirby will need a little help from his...enemies?! By making friends out of foes, up to three* players can drop in or out of the adventure at any time. With new and expanded copy abilities, classic Kirby action is deeper than ever: combine abilities with elements such as ice or fire to create new friend abilities!

game.name: Rayman Legends - Definitive Edition
game.desc: Rayman, Globox, and the Teensies are off wandering through an enchanted forest when they discover a mysterious tent filled with a series of captivating paintings. As they look more closely, they notice each painting seems to tell the story of a mythical world. While focusing on a painting that shows a medieval land, they are suddenly sucked into the painting, entering the world, and the adventure begins. The gang must run, jump, and fight their way through each world to save the day and discover the secrets of every legendary painting.

game.name: Axiom Verge 2
game.desc: Life. Afterlife. Real. Virtual. Dream. Nightmare. It’s a thin line. It’s Axiom Verge 2. The long awaited sequel to Axiom Verge, Axiom Verge 2 expands on the universe with completely new characters, abilities, and gameplay.

game.name: Rush Rally Origins
game.desc: This pack includes the games: Jurassic Pinball, Safari Pinball, Shark Pinball, Halloween Pinball, Werewolf Pinball, Mummy Pinball.

game.name: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends
game.desc: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends is the latest game in the legendary Bubble Bobble series from Taito. Play alone or with up to 3 friends in couch co-op mode and jump your bubble dragons through 100 levels to defy the wicked magician Bonner and his henchmen.

game.name: BurgerTime Party!
game.desc: Sizzle it up on Nintendo Switch! Welcome to Peter Pepper's grill, where the party never ends! Make massive burgers while avoiding edible enemies across over 100 stages stuffed with platforming puzzles and arcade action. Dining solo? We have a carefully curated menu of single-player stages to enjoy. If you're looking for a cooperative challenge, then we invite you to join forces with up to three friends and form the ultimate munch squad! But if you'd rather battle it out for control of the kitchen, choose to play as a pepper-slinging Chef or a menacing Food Foe in Battle Burger mode for 2-4 players!

game.name: Kirby Fighters 2
game.desc: Kirby Fighters 2 is a battle-action Kirby game developed by HAL Laboratory and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch. It was released worldwide on September 23, 2020. A sequel to Kirby Fighters Deluxe and a stand-alone upgrade of the Kirby: Triple Deluxe sub-game Kirby Fighters, Kirby Fighters 2 features more Copy Abilities, stages and playable characters alongside a new Story Mode

game.name: Oceanhorn 2: Knights of the Lost Realm
game.desc: Oceanhorn 2: Knights of the Lost Realm, set a thousand years before the events of the first chapter, takes you on a magical journey across the vast world of Gaia, brimming with mythology and lore. A young Knight faces an impossible challenge, as Warlock Mesmeroth has returned with a formidable Dark Army. Will our hero be able to unite the Owrus, Gillfolk, and men in a fight for the fate of the world? You will not be taking this journey alone. Trin, the granddaughter of Arcadia's leader Archimedes, and Gen, a mysterious robot wielding an old samurai weapon, will join forces with you, and fight at your side against Mesmeroth's Dark Army. Contextual commands will allow you to direct these allies into battle, or have them help you with the solution of the game's most clever puzzles! Bigger, better, and packed with new features – Oceanhorn 2 is not only one of the best-looking adventure games out there, but it also builds a unique experience on the shoulder of classic video games. Collect powerful items, wield the Caster Gun, solve the mysterious puzzles of the ancients, and discover all that Arcadia and its neighboring kingdoms have to offer! Accept the challenge and become a true hero.

game.name: Retro Highway
game.desc: Pure arcade fun! Hit the Retro Highway and return to the days of 16-bit blast processing and pure arcade fun! Retro Highway is a throwback game aiming to combine the accessibility of modern titles with the high-skill challenge and charming aesthetics of old. • Experience high octane old school action on your console in 60 fps • Complete daring challenges and compete with your friends or the whole world for the highest scores • Explore six unique environments ranging from a hot desert freeway to a futuristic moon base • Customize your playstyle by choosing from a diverse garage of 10+ bikes and by upgrading various powerups • Embrace the nostalgia rush caused by stylish pixel art visuals and chiptune soundtrack

game.name: SNIPER Hunter Scope
game.desc: BECOME THE ULTIMATE HUNTER! In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win! Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups. Game includes: 15+ STAGES 30+ WEAPONS 30+ GALLERY ITEMS 60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

game.name: Space Invaders: Invincible Collection
game.desc: Space Invaders is a founding block of video game history that filled the arcades. It is said that the game made 100 Yen coins scarce and defined the visuals and mechanics in the first decade of video games. Until this day, Space Invaders remains highly successful in the gaming industry as well as it is highly prominent in pop culture. Now the most complete collection on cart ever, the Space Invaders Invincible Collection, is heading to the West. It combines all titles from the Japanese standard and special releases on one cartridge, the limited Western collection even has the console port of the game Arkanoid vs. Space Invaders on cartridge, a unique title which was only available as a download code in the Japanese version! Includes: Space Invaders (1978, Arcade) – b/w Space Invaders (1978, Arcade) – colour Space Invaders Part II (1979, Arcade) Majestic Twelve: The Space Invaders Part IV (1990, Arcade) Super Space Invaders ’91 (1990, Arcade) Space Invaders Extreme (2018) Space Invaders Gigamax 4 SE (2018) Arkanoid vs. Space Invaders (2017) Space Invaders DX (1994, Arcade) Space Cyclone (1980, Arcade) Lunar Rescue (1979, Arcade)

game.name: The Legend of Zelda - Skyward Sword HD
game.desc: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword game soars onto Nintendo Switch! Take to the skies, draw your sword, and experience the earliest story in the Legend of Zelda series. Join Link in his high-flying quest to save Zelda, a childhood friend who must confront her destiny. Soar between floating islands and descend to the treacherous surface world in this updated HD version of the Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword. Master realistic swordplay that matches your movements Swing your sword and angle your slashes to uncover and break through opponents’ defenses using intuitive motion controls. Link will match the angle of each strike you make with the Joy-Con controller, creating immersive swordplay that relies on strategy and accuracy. Movements feel smoother and more immediate thanks to the Nintendo Switch system’s increased processing power and HD graphics. Take advantage of the newly-added button only control scheme—perfect for playing in handheld mode or on the Nintendo Switch Lite system.
game.image: ./mixart/The Legend of Zelda - Skyward Sword HD.jpg
game.video: ./snap/The Legend of Zelda - Skyward Sword HD.mp4
game.marquee: ./wheel/The Legend of Zelda - Skyward Sword HD.png

game.name: NASCAR Heat Ultimate Edition
game.desc: NASCAR Heat Ultimate Edition+, the official video game of the 2020 season, the world’s most popular stockcar racing series puts you behind the wheel and challenges you to become the NASCAR Cup Series champion. Features the 2020 official teams, drivers, cars and schedule from the three NASCAR National Series as well as the Xtreme Dirt Tour, racing on 39 authentic tracks. Ultimate Edition+ includes everything in NASCAR Heat 5 Ultimate Edition, plus the 2021 NASCAR Cup Series Cars Roster and 2021 primary paint schemes. Featured content includes 2020 Throwback and Playoff paint schemes, Tony Stewart as a playable character, plus more! FEATURES: • Career Mode – Progress through the feeder series (Xtreme Dirt, Gander Trucks and Xfinity Series) to reach the NASCAR Cup Series or jump right in and start at the top. • Improved Stats – Track your progress through the Career with more detailed and improved statistics offering far more insight.

game.name: Popeye
game.desc: The official Popeye game in which you play the spinach eating sailor in this modernized adaptation of the classic arcade game. The objective of the game is to get the highest score by completing as many levels as you can by collecting hearts and letters thrown down by Olive all while trying to avoid the dangers of the witch, vulture and Popeye's rival Brutus. Find and eat the spinach and get the special powers needed to punch your enemies into the sea and become faster at collecting the items before they return. Popeye is a simple, pick up and play, fast action, fun game which anyone can play, but be warned winning a high score won't come easy.

game.name: Retrograde Arena
game.desc: Use weapons, physics, and your Drone to push, pull, and blast your foes into deadly surroundings in skill-based multiplayer physics focused action title, Retrograde Arena Retrograde Arena is a multiplayer twin stick shooter where bullets don’t kill, but the environment does! Weapons are your ultimate tools, not just for blasting enemies, but for propelling your customizable Drone around the maps at great speed! Mastering Retrograde Arena’s recoil propulsion and the impact of the various weapons is essential for victory in the neon soaked world of Retrograde Arena. Battle against friends, strangers, or deadly AI with up to 6 players in three different game modes that will demand different skills and styles of play! Physics Based Use physics to your advantage! Use your weapon’s recoil to evade or propel yourself at great speeds. Deflect an enemy’s attack with a well-placed shot, propel yourself and body slam a troublesome foe, or even blast pieces of the scenery into an unsuspecting foe! Skill Focused Multiplayer Retrograde Arena features online amp; local multiplayer! Play with friends on the same console with multiple controllers.

game.name: Super Impossible Road
game.desc: In the future, you’ve got to play a little dirty if you want to win races. Master hairpin turns across dangerous courses that twist and coil-over beautiful galactic backdrops, knocking opponents into the void of space. Kick into hyperdrive with temporary speed boosts and use every opportunity to jump off the paths of the rollercoaster-like tracks. Bypass gates and checkpoints and roll over competitors on the way to first place!

game.name: Pure Chase 80's
game.desc:
You'll feel the essence of arcade racing oozing out of your pores and your adrenaline pumping non-stop.
Mission: « A car bomb under your feet » If you don't want to see chunks of your vehicle flying off, maintain your concentration in the race of your life. Escape to the border as fast as you can, and before the countdown reaches «(00:00)».
With 3 levels of difficulty including longer routes and new scenarios.
Travel through different locations around the world with "no loading times". From the Egyptian desert to the snowy Alps, through cities, The american west, caves... and many more locations for you to discover on your adventure.
Real-time weather changes. You'll go from day to night and back again, while going full throttle in harsh weather conditions such as fog, rain, snow, thunder, etc.

game.name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land
game.desc: Float off on an all-new adventure as the powerful puffball, Kirby. Explore in 3D stages as you discover a mysterious world with abandoned structures from a past civilization - like a shopping mall?! Copy enemies’ abilities like the new Drill and Ranger and use them to attack, explore your surroundings, and save the kidnapped Waddle Dees from the ferocious Beast Pack alongside the mysterious Elfilin. Hope you’re hungry for an unforgettable adventure! Feeling hungry? Kirby can inhale real-world objects and transform using Mouthful Mode! Why get one drink from a vending machine when you can swallow the whole thing? Then, use your boxy body to shoot out cans at baddies. Consume a car to gain some wheels and slam through walls. Sit back and take it all in...literally. Pass a Joy-Con controller to a buddy to play as the spear-wielding Bandana Waddle Dee and help each other explore and battle through this colorful world. While Kirby can float and inhale enemies, Bandana Waddle Dee can spin and stab with his sturdy spear. Find friendship in this forgotten world and save the Waddle Dees! Float over obstacles and fight through enemies on your way to each stage’s goal as you slash, poke, freeze, and hammer using Kirby’s copy abilities.

game.name: Golf Story
game.desc:
Golf Story combines the sheer excitement of golf with a serious story that plays out over 8 different courses. Play the story of a golfer who is forced to give up all that he holds dear for one last shot at accomplishing his dreams.
But all is not so simple in the world of golf. To best today's players you have to be able to keep up with them both on and off the course.

game.name: Diablo 3 - Eternal Collection
game.desc: Ages ago, angels and demons birthed your world in a forbidden union. Now they've come to claim it. Stand tall among Sanctuary's meek and wicked to battle walking corpses, horrifying cultists, fallen seraphs, and the Lords of Hell. When the High Heavens and the Burning Hells war, humanity must be its own salvation.

game.name: Virtua Racing
game.desc: Virtua Racing or V.R. for short, is a Formula One racing arcade game, developed by Sega AM2 and released in 1992. Virtua Racing was initially a proof-of-concept application for exercising a new 3D-graphics platform under development, the "Model 1". The results were so encouraging, that Virtua Racing was fully developed into a standalone arcade title. Though its use of 3D polygonal graphics was predated by arcade rivals Namco (Winning Run in 1988) and Atari (Hard Drivin' in 1989), Virtua Racing had vastly improved visuals in terms of polygon count, frame rate, and overall scene complexity, and displayed multiple camera angles and 3D human non-player characters, which all contributed to a greater sense of immersion. Virtua Racing is regarded as one of the most influential video games of all time, for laying the foundations for subsequent 3D racing games and for popularizing 3D polygonal graphics among a wider audience

game.name: Startide
game.desc: Play as an elite pilot driving the Interstellar Recon Mecha geared with a unique set of weapons and special abilities. Choose your favorite fighter and face the procedurally generated enemy fleet.

game.name: Wild and Horror Pinball
game.desc: This pack includes the games: Jurassic Pinball, Safari Pinball, Shark Pinball, Halloween Pinball, Werewolf Pinball, Mummy Pinball.

game.name: Gunlord X
game.desc: This game features 11 stages of exciting 2D game play with over 60 unique enemy types. Blast yourself through giant landscapes, explore caverns and reveal all secrets! The critically acclaimed platform action game Gunlord developed by NGDEV in 2012 comes back to the Switch in 2019. The game received an intense "Hi-Bit" overhaul for modern game consoles in a widescreen format. Additionally new boss enemies and extended stages were added. Here’s a quick overview feature list: • Significantly increased level size of the later levels offering new secrets and challenges. • 4 new boss enemies • Added a completely new horizontal jet pack stage • Permanent continue and shortcut/level warp unlocks by collecting all big diamonds in stage. • Auto save and level select features (you can revisit already beat stages at any time) • Accomplishments screens and statistics screens for speedrunners • Limited enemy respawns to essential enemies. • Added Newgame+ (for speedrunning and new secrets) • Increased the viewport to widescreen • Improved viewport scrolling • Scanline/RGB CRT TV shader • Increased sprite/particle effects • Added alpha blending special FX (Hi-Bit "32-bit" style) • Added parallax scrolling elements • Added new music tracks • Improved controls (direct control over the 360° snake beam with R Stick) • Optional modern twin stick controls (control movement and shooting direction independently) • Fully customizable controls • Improved difficulty curve especially on bosses • Rebalanced weapon powerlevels • Added a new power shot weapon

game.name: Legend Of Zelda - Links Awakening, The
game.desc: As Link, you awaken in a strange land away from Hyrule, where animals talk and monsters roam. To uncover the truth behind your whereabouts and rouse the legendary Wind Fish, explore Koholint Island and all its trap-ridden dungeons, reimagined in stunning detail for this new release of one of the most beloved The Legend of Zelda games. Along the way, you'll meet a hilarious assortment of charming characters to which you'll never want to say goodbye.

game.name: Galaxy Shooter
game.desc: Take your starship to fight! Cruise the Galaxy and shoot down formations of evil space invaders. Dodge the bullet hell and shoot ’em up!

game.name: 30-in-1 Game Collection Volume 1
game.desc: MASTER 30 GAMES THAT WILL TEST REFLEX, MEMORY amp; WITS! Defense your village against Vikings, climb to the top of the tower and overcome obstacles, play a round of hockey, switch colors and pass safely through gates, or play the classics such as snake, memory or cup game! In this abundance of pick-up-and-play games, you can play solo, or get the party started, as over half of games have support for up to 4 players. This is the best and most diverse collection of challenging games available on Nintendo Switch™ for the price of just one game! Anyone, regardless of age or skill level, will have an absolute blast playing any of the 30 party games, 18 of which can be played with up to 4 players for some friendly cooperative or competitive play. And with the portability of Nintendo Switch, players can turn just about any location into their own personal party for friends and family.

game.name: 30-in-1 Game Collection Volume 2
game.desc: MASTER 30 GAMES THAT WILL TEST REFLEX, MEMORY WITS! Defense your village against Vikings, climb to the top of the tower and overcome obstacles, play a round of hockey, switch colors and pass safely through gates, or play the classics such as snake, memory or cup game! In this abundance of pick-up-and-play games, you can play solo, or get the party started, as over half of games have support for up to 4 players. This is the best and most diverse collection of challenging games available on Nintendo Switch™ for the price of just one game! Anyone, regardless of age or skill level, will have an absolute blast playing any of the 30 party games, 18 of which can be played with up to 4 players for some friendly cooperative or competitive play. And with the portability of Nintendo Switch, players can turn just about any location into their own personal party for friends and family.

game.name: Chocobo GP
game.desc: Chocobo GP racing classic originally on PS1 now in HD for the Nintendo Switch! Join Chocobo and friends as they hit the track in a variety of wacky vehicles! Learn the basics in story mode, then take on all-comers in the game mode of your choice! Use classic magic spells like fire and aero to blast the competition, or even turn the tables in a miracle comeback with each character’s unique abilities! Numerous ways to play, including time attack challenges and tournament-style survival races.

game.name: Sports and Adventure Pinball
game.desc: This pack includes the games: World Soccer Pinball, Touchdown Pinball, Basketball Pinball, Dragon Pinball, Pirates Pinball and Titan Pinball.

game.name: Goblin Sword
game.desc: Goblin Sword is a retro-inspired action platformer with light rpg elements. An army of monsters led by an evil wizard have invaded your hometown. Slay as many monsters as you can, collect loot, avoid dangerous traps and defeat menacing bosses, before facing the evil wizard himself. Features: • 89 levels • 13 bosses • 30 weapons with unique special attacks • 30 relics that grant you abilities • 14 costumes • 8 guardians that follow you around and assist you • 5 secret very hard levels • Decorate your home with souvenirs

game.name: Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury
game.desc:
Enjoy two Mario adventures solo or with friends!
Pounce and climb through dozens of colorful courses! Mario (and his friends) can use a variety of power-ups like the Super Bell, which grants catlike abilities like climbing and scratching. Team up with up to three other players locally or online to reach the goal and see who can get a high score.
Explore a seamless feline world in the new Bowser’s Fury adventure
Free-roaming Super Mario gameplay makes a return in this brand-new adventure. Bowser has become gargantuan and lost all control! Explore Lake Lapcat and its islands, complete objectives to collect Cat Shines, and team up with Bowser Jr. to bring his big, bad dad back to normal. Just watch out for Bowser’s island-wide attacks.
The Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury game features the same great co-op gameplay, creative levels and power-ups as the original game, but with added improvements. In the Super Mario 3D World part of the game, characters move faster and the dash powers up more quickly. Both adventures support the newly added Snapshot Mode—pause the action to get the perfect shot, apply filters, and decorate with stamps!
In Super Mario 3D World, choose from Mario, Luigi, Peach, and Toad and set off to save the Sprixie Kingdom. Each character has a distinct playstyle—Luigi can jump extra high and Peach can float for a short time. Rosalina is also available as a playable character later in the game! Jump, dash, and pounce to reach the goal while collecting Green Stars, coins and power-ups.
Collect stamps throughout your adventure in Super Mario 3D World and use them in Snapshot Mode (in both Super Mario 3D World and the Bowser’s Fury adventure) to create masterpieces to share with friends and family.
In Bowser’s Fury, Mario arrives on Lake Lapcat and is confronted with a rampaging Bowser! Join forces with Bowser Jr. and venture through an interconnected world made of cat-themed…well, everything. Enemies, flowers, and even birds take on a feline form.
Need some extra assistance bringing Bowser out of his frenzied, furious state? Another player can take control of Bowser Jr. and help out by attacking enemies and storing power-ups. Two sets of claws are better than one!

game.name: CRUIS’N BLAST
game.desc: The arcade hit Cruis’n Blast is speeding onto Nintendo Switch! Blast your way through nearly 30 over-the-top tracks. Grab the wheel of 23 custom rides from licensed supercars to monster trucks and unicorns! Up to four players can race together, so pick your favorite vehicle and hit the road!

game.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate + DLC
game.desc: New characters and stages join the entire legacy roster! Gaming icons clash in the ultimate brawl you can play anytime, anywhere! Smash rivals off the stage as new characters Simon Belmont and King K. Rool join Inkling, Ridley, and every other fighter in Super Smash Bros. history. Enjoy enhanced speed and combat at new stages based on the Castlevania series, Super Mario Odyssey, and more! Having trouble choosing a stage? Then select the Stage Morph option to transform one stage into another while battling - a series first! Plus, new echo fighters Dark Samus, Richter Belmont, and Chrom join the battle. Whether you play locally or online, savor the faster combat, new attacks, and new defensive options, like a perfect shield. Jam out to 900 different music compositions and go 1-on-1 with a friend, hold a 4-player free-for-all, kick it up to 8-player battles and more! Feel free to bust out your GameCube controllers - legendary couch competitions await - or play together anytime, anywhere!

game.name: Metroid Prime Remastered
game.desc: Suit up for an iconic adventure Intergalactic bounty hunter Samus Aran receives a distress signal from a wrecked frigate in orbit around planet Tallon IV. Upon investigation, the frigate reveals itself to be a Space Pirate research vessel home to terrifying genetic experiments using the mysterious Phazon substance. There, Samus encounters her nemesis, Meta Ridley, whom she pursues to the surface of Tallon IV. It’s up to her alone to explore the planet’s interconnected regions, investigate its dark secrets, and end the intergalactic threat posed by Phazon. Experience this critically acclaimed first-person adventure like never before with remastered visuals, audio, controls, and more.

game.name: 1917 The Alien Invasion DX
game.desc: A retro-inspired shoot 'em up game set in an alternate history version of World War I.

game.name: 3000th Duel
game.desc: A dark fantasy action RPG that challenges you to fight and explore your way through a ruined world of perilous ruins, ominous caves, and twisted monsters. Discover mysteries, hidden secrets and ancient lore as you journey on your quest.

game.name: ACA NEOGEO MAGICIAN LORD
game.desc: Magician Lord is a side-scrolling action game released by SNK in 1990.

game.name: Age of Heroes The Beginning
game.desc: Embark on an epic adventure as you build your own team of heroes in this turn-based RPG.

game.path: ./Air Jet Fighter Combat - Europe Fly Plane Attack.nsp
game.name: Air Jet Fighter Combat - Europe Fly Plane Attack
game.desc: Take to the skies and engage in epic aerial battles in this thrilling jet fighter combat game set in Europe!
game.image: ./mixart/Air Jet Fighter Combat - Europe Fly Plane Attack.jpg
game.video: ./snap/Air Jet Fighter Combat - Europe Fly Plane Attack.mp4

game.name: Albacete Warrior
game.desc: Albacete Warrior is a 2D side-scrolling action game where you must battle through hordes of enemies and bosses to reach the end of each level.

game.name: All-Star Fruit Racing
game.desc: Experience the excitement of frenzied racing on dozens of crazy tracks with tons of jumps, boosts, and power-ups.

game.name: Anodyne
game.desc: Immerse yourself in the nostalgic world of Anodyne, a relaxing adventure game that features surreal landscapes and intriguing characters.

game.name: Anodyne 2: Return to Dust
game.desc: Anodyne 2: Return to Dust is a 2D and 3D adventure game that combines action, puzzle-solving, and exploration.

game.name: Arcade Archives DON DOKO DON
game.desc: Arcade Archives DON DOKO DON is a classic action game originally released in 1989. The game is set in a construction site, and players must use their hammers to defeat enemies and progress through the levels.

game.name: Arcade Archives GALAXIAN
game.desc: Arcade Archives GALAXIAN is a classic shooter game originally released in 1979. Players control a spaceship and must defeat waves of enemy aliens while dodging their attacks. The game features colorful graphics and challenging gameplay.

game.name: Arcade Archives KIKI KAIKAI
game.desc: Arcade Archives KIKI KAIKAI is a classic action game originally released in 1986. Players control the shrine maiden Sayo and must fight off various ghosts and monsters to save her kidnapped friend Taro. The game features colorful graphics and a unique Japanese setting.

game.name: Arcade Archives TANK FORCE
game.desc: Arcade Archives TANK FORCE is a classic tank battle game originally released in 1991. Players control a tank and must battle through various levels while avoiding obstacles and enemy fire. The game features a variety of power-ups and upgrades to collect, as well as a two-player cooperative mode.

game.name: Arcade Classics Anniversary Collection
game.desc: Arcade Classics Anniversary Collection is a compilation of classic arcade games from the 1980s and 1990s. The collection includes 8 games: Haunted Castle, Typhoon (A-Jax), Nemesis (Gradius), Vulcan Venture (Gradius II), Life Force (Salamander), Thunder Cross, Scramble, and TwinBee. The games feature updated graphics and various gameplay options.

game.name: Arietta of Spirits
game.desc: Arietta of Spirits is an adventure game developed by Third Spirit Games. The game follows the story of Arietta, a girl who can see spirits. She returns to her childhood home on the island of Natura to visit her grandfather, but finds the island is full of secrets and mysteries. Players must explore the island, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth about the spirits and the island's past.

game.name: Arkanoid - Eternal Battle
game.desc: Arkanoid - Eternal Battle is an arcade-style action game developed by Taito Corporation. The game is a modern take on the classic Arkanoid game, featuring updated graphics and new gameplay mechanics. Players must use their paddle to bounce a ball and destroy all the bricks on each level, while avoiding obstacles and power-ups that can help or hinder their progress.

game.name: Asphalt 9 Legends
game.desc: Asphalt 9 Legends is a high-octane racing game developed by Gameloft Barcelona. Players can take the wheel of some of the world's most powerful and iconic cars, and race across a variety of stunning real-world locations. With stunning graphics and intuitive controls, Asphalt 9 Legends is the ultimate racing experience on the Nintendo Switch.

game.name: ATOMIK: RunGunJumpGun

Players take on the role of an intergalactic hero armed with a powerful gun and tasked with navigating through dangerous environments filled with obstacles and enemies. With tight controls, challenging gameplay, and a pulsing electronic soundtrack, ATOMIK: RunGunJumpGun is a thrilling ride from start to finish.

game.name: B.ARK

game.name: Beekyr Reloaded

game.name: Beholder 2
game.desc: Beholder 2 is a dystopian adventure game set in a totalitarian state. Players take on the role of a newly appointed department officer tasked with enforcing the government's policies and keeping the population in check. With multiple endings and a branching storyline, players' choices will have a direct impact on the game's outcome. Beholder 2 offers a gripping narrative and complex gameplay mechanics that challenge players to make difficult moral choices in a dark and oppressive world.

game.name: Beholder Complete Edition
game.desc: Beholder Complete Edition is a dystopian adventure game set in a totalitarian state. Players take on the role of a landlord in an apartment building owned by the government. With a variety of tenants to manage, each with their own secrets and agendas, players must balance their duties to the state with their desire to help or exploit their tenants. The Complete Edition includes the base game and the "Blissful Sleep" DLC, which adds new characters and storylines. Beholder Complete Edition offers a gripping narrative and complex gameplay mechanics that challenge players to make difficult moral choices in a dark and oppressive world.

game.name: Psikyo Collection Vol. 3
game.desc: Psikyo Collection Vol. 3 is a collection of classic shoot 'em up games developed by Psikyo, a Japanese video game developer. The collection includes four games: Gunbird, Gunbird 2, Strikers 1945 III, and Sol Divide.

game.name: Psikyo Shooting Stars Alpha
game.desc: Psikyo Shooting Stars Alpha is a collection of classic shoot 'em up games developed by Psikyo, a Japanese video game developer. The collection includes six games: Strikers 1945, Strikers 1945 II, Strikers 1945 III, Sol Divide, Dragon Blaze, and Zero Gunner 2. Each game features fast-paced arcade-style gameplay, a variety of power-ups and weapons, and challenging bosses.

game.name: Psikyo Shooting Stars Bravo
game.desc: Psikyo Shooting Stars Bravo is a collection of classic shoot 'em up games developed by Psikyo, a Japanese video game developer. The collection includes five games: Samurai Aces, Samurai Aces Episode II: TENGAI, Samurai Aces Episode III: SENGOKU CANNON, Gunbarich, and Gunbird. Each game features fast-paced arcade-style gameplay, a variety of power-ups and weapons, and challenging bosses.

game.name: Pukan Bye-Bye
game.desc: Pukan Bye-Bye is a puzzle game developed by Success Corporation for the Nintendo Switch. The game features cute and colorful graphics and simple gameplay mechanics. Players must clear a board filled with colored blocks by matching them with blocks of the same color. The game features multiple modes, including a story mode, challenge mode, and multiplayer mode.

game.name: Puyo Puyo eSports
game.desc: Puyo Puyo eSports is a puzzle game developed by Sonic Team for the Nintendo Switch. The game features classic Puyo Puyo gameplay, where players must match colored blobs called Puyos in order to clear their playfield and send Garbage Puyos to their opponent's playfield. The game features various single-player and multiplayer modes, including a ranking mode for competitive play, and supports online play.

game.name: Puzzle Bobble 2X BUST-A-MOVE 2 Arcade Edition S-Tribute
game.desc: Puzzle Bobble 2X is a puzzle game developed by Taito Corporation for the Nintendo Switch. The game features classic Puzzle Bobble gameplay, where players must match colored bubbles in order to clear their playfield and progress through the game's various stages. The game features various single-player and multiplayer modes, including a challenge mode and a VS CPU mode.

game.name: QUByte Classics Radical Rex by PIKO
game.desc: QUByte Classics Radical Rex by PIKO is a retro platformer game developed by QUByte Interactive and published by Pix Arts. The game features classic side-scrolling gameplay, where players control a green dinosaur named Rex as he jumps, stomps, and breathes fire to defeat enemies and navigate levels. The game includes both the original Radical Rex game, as well as a remastered version with enhanced graphics and new features.

game.name: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition
game.desc: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition is a platformer game developed by Slipgate Studios and published by HandyGames. The game features classic side-scrolling gameplay, where players control a young boy named Rad as he jumps, shoots, and explores various levels filled with enemies and hazards. The game includes both single-player and co-op modes, as well as additional content not found in the original release of the game.

game.name: Radioactive Dwarfs Evil From the Sewers
game.desc: Enter a world of danger and intrigue as you navigate through the sewers, battling evil radioactive dwarfs who seek to destroy everything in their path. Use your wits and cunning to survive and emerge victorious in this thrilling adventure game.

game.name: Rage Among the Stars
game.desc: Rage Among the Stars is an action-packed, space-themed, side-scrolling shooter game that challenges players to battle their way through hordes of alien enemies.

game.name: Raiden III
game.desc: Raiden Remixed - Choose between original and remixed background music, complete with individual track selection for each stage!,World Class Pilot - Compete against other players in the world rankings, and watch their replays to see what you;re up against!,Twice the Firepower - Pilot two ships at once in any game mode with Double Play!,As the extraterrestrial race known as the Crystals launches another attack on Earth, it;s up to you to end their assault! Raiden III x MIKADO MANIAX is an electrifying entry in the series, and marks the debut of Raiden III on modern consoles including Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. While staying true to its classic origins, a suite of exciting content allows this title to truly take flight! Relive the original arcade experience with vertical screen play while deploying several unique wallpapers for the edges of the screen. Add a jolt to the traditional Raiden formula by choosing from gameplay modes such as Score Attack and Boss Rush, along with Double Play, the ability to pilot two ships at once. Reach new heights by competing against players online in the world rankings, and elevate your experience by choosing between original or remixed background music, as well as individual tracks for each stage.

game.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth
game.desc: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth is a 2D action platformer game developed by Team Ladybug and published by Playism. Based on the popular anime and light novel series Record of Lodoss War, the game follows the elf Deedlit as she explores the mysterious "Wonder Labyrinth" in search of her missing friends. Featuring fast-paced combat and exploration, the game also includes RPG elements such as leveling up and equipping new items and abilities.

game.name: Red Siren: Space Defense
game.desc: Red Siren: Space Defense is a 2D shoot 'em up game developed by Navigame and published by QubicGames. Set in a futuristic sci-fi universe, the game features fast-paced, vertically scrolling gameplay, with players taking control of a spaceship to battle against waves of enemy ships and bosses. The game features multiple game modes, including Story, Endless, and Boss Rush, and also includes an upgrade system for the player's ship and a two-player local co-op mode.

game.name: REDO!
game.desc: REDO! is a 2D action-adventure game developed by Robson Paiva and published by QUByte Interactive. The game follows a lone survivor in a post-apocalyptic world as they embark on a journey to discover the truth behind the cataclysmic event that destroyed their world. Featuring Metroidvania-style gameplay, the game offers a vast interconnected world to explore, a variety of enemies to defeat, and abilities to unlock that allow the player to reach new areas. With a retro pixel-art aesthetic and a moody atmospheric soundtrack, REDO! offers a challenging and immersive experience for players.

game.name: Reknum DX
game.desc: Reknum DX is a 2D platformer game that follows the adventure of the warrior and princess, along with a dark knight who will join them in their journey to stop the evil plans of the sorceress, in a world of fantasy, magic, and mystery. With challenging levels, enemies, and bosses, Reknum DX provides an immersive and engaging experience for players of all skill levels.

game.name: Rick Henderson
game.desc: Rick Henderson is a retro-style 2D shooter game where you play as the titular character, a space pilot who has been sent on a mission to stop an alien invasion of Earth. With fast-paced action and challenging boss battles, Rick Henderson is a game that will keep you engaged from start to finish.

game.name: Riptide GP Renegade
game.desc: Riptide GP Renegade is a high-speed water racing game where you play as a hydrojet rider who has been framed and banned from the Riptide GP league. With stunning graphics, fast-paced gameplay, and challenging opponents, you must race your way back to the top and reclaim your position as the best hydrojet rider in the world. Featuring single player career mode and local multiplayer, Riptide GP Renegade is a game that will keep you entertained for hours.

game.name: River City Girls
game.desc: River City Girls is a beat 'em up game set in the River City universe. You play as either Kyoko or Misako, two high school students who must fight their way through the city to rescue their kidnapped boyfriends. Featuring hand-drawn graphics, a variety of enemies, and satisfying combat mechanics, River City Girls (CH) is a game that will keep you entertained for hours.

game.name: Robo Revenge Squad
game.desc: Robo Revenge Squad is a 2D action platformer with retro-style graphics and a futuristic theme. The game features 6 unique levels, 5 bosses, and challenging gameplay that will test your skills.

game.name: Rock N Racing Bundle Off Road and Grand Prix
game.desc: Get ready for some off-road and Grand Prix racing action with Rock N Racing Bundle!

game.name: Rush Rally 3

game.name: Samurai Bringer

game.name: SAMURAI MAIDEN
game.desc: A retro-style 2D action game with a Japanese maid who fights against monsters in a fantasy world.

game.name: Samurai Warrior
game.desc: A thrilling action-packed adventure game set in feudal Japan, where players take on the role of a samurai warrior on a quest to save their clan and restore honor. The game features intense sword-fighting combat, breathtaking environments, and a gripping storyline.

game.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
game.desc: Embark on a brand new adventure with Shantae, the hair-whipping belly dancing genie!

game.name: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
game.desc: In Shantae's fifth adventure, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city, make new Half-Genie friends, and battle the Seven Sirens in her biggest, most thrilling quest yet!

game.name: Shantae Half Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
game.desc: Embark on a brand new adventure with Shantae, the hair-whipping, belly-dancing, shape-shifting genie. After saving her hometown from destruction, Shantae is ready to explore the world and help out her friends. But when a mysterious crime wave sweeps Sequin Land, she must put her whirling combat skills to the test and confront the mastermind behind the evil scheme!

game.name: Shantae Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
game.desc: Embark on an all-new adventure with Shantae, the hair-whipping belly dancing genie. After losing her magic, Shantae teams up with the nefarious pirate Risky Boots in order to save Sequin Land from a mysterious curse.

game.name: She Wants Me Dead

With a pulsing electro soundtrack, pixel art visuals and a fast-paced rhythm-based gameplay, She Wants Me Dead is the perfect game for fans of difficult platformers.

game.name: Shmup Collection
game.desc: Shmup Collection is a compilation of six classic arcade-style shoot 'em up games, featuring a variety of bullet patterns and enemy types to challenge players.

game.name: Shootas Blood and Teef

game.name: Shotgun Farmers
game.desc: Shotgun Farmers is the online multiplayer shooter where your bullets grow the guns. Harvest weapon plants quickly for more ammo or let them grow for a larger clip.

game.name: Shovel Knight Dig
game.desc: Embark on a thrilling underground adventure in Shovel Knight Dig, the latest entry in the popular Shovel Knight series! Dig your way through dirt and gems while avoiding enemies and traps, and collect treasures along the way. With procedurally generated levels and a wide range of power-ups and upgrades, no two runs will be the same.

game.name: Shred! Remastered
game.desc: Shred! Remastered is an intense snowboarding game with a unique control scheme that puts you in charge of carving your way down the mountain. With multiple game modes, procedurally generated levels, and a killer soundtrack, this game will keep you coming back for more.

game.name: Sine Mora EX

Mixing classic shooter sensibilities with contemporary presentation, Sine Mora is a gorgeous shoot'em up offering both a Story Mode that weaves an over-the-top tale and an Arcade Mode that provides deep, satisfying gameplay to challenge fans of the genre.

game.name: Super Jagger Bomb
game.desc: Use superhuman speed and agility to protect the world from explosive disaster in this 80s style arcade game. Take the role of a little caped hero whose duty it is to collect bombs and keep stuff from getting blown up! In this retro 80s style arcade game, you;ll help the fearless hero Jagger fend of enemy robots and UFOs as he leaps across platforms, air jumps and uses downward dashes to retrieve the firebombs before it;s too late! With retro-styled 3D graphics and mechanics that are easy to pick up and play but tough to master, Super Jagger Bomb offers a straightforward and rewarding gameplay experience. Travel to locations around the globe, from ancient ruins to cityscapes, and use power-ups to clear the screen of enemy robots and UFOs. Upload your high score to online leaderboards.

game.name: Super Sunny Island
game.desc: Embark on a tropical adventure in Super Sunny Island. Explore lush forests, sandy beaches, and hidden caves while collecting treasure and battling enemies. With colorful graphics and a catchy soundtrack, this game is perfect for players of all ages.

game.name: Super Toy Cars Collection
game.desc: Experience the thrill of toy car racing with Super Toy Cars Collection! Choose from a variety of toy vehicles and race on exciting tracks filled with obstacles and power-ups. With multiple game modes, local and online multiplayer, and customizable vehicles, Super Toy Cars Collection is the ultimate toy car racing game.
game.lang: en, fr, de, es, it, pt, nl, ru, ja, ko, zh

game.name: Sword of the Vagrant
game.desc: Explore a dangerous, dark world and fight your way through hordes of enemies in Sword of the Vagrant. Play as a skilled swordsman and use your abilities to slice through enemies with precision. Discover new weapons and unlock powerful abilities as you progress through the game's levels. With challenging boss battles and intense combat, Sword of the Vagrant is a must-play for fans of action games.

game.name: TAITO Milestones
game.desc: Replay the classics where it all began!Taitos arcade legacy began in the early 1970s, but it came into its own in the 80s. You now have the chance to play these milestone classics that paved the way for the decades of Taito;s arcade dominance which followed. Ten games, each representing a specific breakthrough in development and gaming history, spanning a variety of genres. Platform, sports, shooting, puzzle and more. And now those 10 classics will be available for the first time as a collection on a modern console! Take a deep dive into gaming history and relive the classics that helped shape it. 10 groundbreaking classics from Taito;s arcade vault A variety of genres and gameplay styles The origin of pixel graphics and art, with a timeless lookGames included: QIX, 1981, Puzzle. Draw lines as the Marker and capture areas by encircling them! Watch out for enemies while moving around! SPACE SEEKER, 1981, Shooting. Check the map screen for steadily approaching enemies, intercept the air force strategically, and strike the mobile fortress! ALPINE SKI, 1982, Sports. Enter the world of snow and take part in three competitions: Downhill ski, slalom and ski jump! FRONT LINE, 1982, Run-and-Gun. Push forward to the enemy camp as a foot soldier! You can also drive tanks and armored vehicles! WILD WESTERN, 1982, Shooting. Defeat the gangs attacking from all directions with your trusty rifle! You are the law!Chack'n Pop, 1983, Platform. Hang in there, Chack;n! Get back the hearts from the thieving monsters!ELEVATOR ACTION, 1983, Action. Infiltrate a building as a spy on a solo mission, get all the secret documents and make your escape! The FairyLand Story, 1985, Platformer. As the witch Ptolemy, defeat the monsters deep inside the castle!HALLEY'S COMET, 1986, Shooting. Halley;s comet is headed for the planets of our solar system! Destroy the computer at its centre!THE NINJAWARRIORS, 1987, Action. Advance into enemy territory as an android ninja to crush the evil Banglar;s ambitions!

game.name: Tales of Symphonia Remastered
game.desc: Join the epic journey of a group of friends as they embark on a quest to save their world from a malevolent force in Tales of Symphonia Remastered. With its engaging storyline, deep characters, and real-time battle system, this classic RPG has been remastered with improved graphics and added content, making it the perfect opportunity for both newcomers and fans of the series to experience this timeless adventure.
game.lang: en, ja, fr, es, de, it

game.name: Tanuki Justice
game.desc: Tanuki Justice is a fast-paced action platformer set in feudal Japan. Play as two tanuki, sisters with magical powers, as they take on hordes of enemies and bosses with their ninja skills and special abilities. With tight controls and gorgeous pixel art graphics, Tanuki Justice is a love letter to classic arcade games and a must-play for fans of the genre.
game.lang: en, fr, de, es, it, pt, nl, ja, ko, zh

game.name: The Awakening of Mummies
game.desc: The Mummies are trapped inside the Pyramid where the evil Pharaoh Cleo has imprisoned them. Use your puzzle-solving skills to guide all the Mummies through the various chambers, but watch out for traps!

game.name: The Bounty Huntress
game.desc: In this action-packed adventure, play as the skilled and daring Bounty Huntress as she tracks down the galaxy's most notorious criminals!

game.name: The Legend of Gwen
game.desc: Defeat time and The Evil, and become the best sorceress or witch in the world! Gwen has just arrived at the school of sorcery, but she arrived at a bad time just when she arrived she couldn't even have her welcome party because there was a surprise guest... "The evil!" The evil did not hesitate twice and began to absorb everything he could from the school! Help Gwen with this challenge and defeat evil (if you can!). Features include visiting different moons with their own obstacles, colors, and enemies; traps, enemies, and big bosses on each of the moons; timed levels without enemies, they are true tests of agility and skill; collecting different seeds for the garden; isometric mode and different points of view of all levels to help find secrets; help chests and a boss hunter to aid with the high difficulty of the game; checkpoint magic (not available in timed levels); and a game mode with the use of two characters at the same time in a challenge with Corki. The game features six different types of wands that change the style of play!

game.name: The Messenger
game.desc: Take on the role of a ninja warrior tasked with delivering a powerful scroll in this action-packed adventure game. Travel across a beautiful, pixelated world filled with challenges, enemies, and secrets as you strive to complete your mission and save your village. Master the art of acrobatic combat, upgrade your skills and equipment, and uncover the dark secrets lurking beneath the surface of this epic tale.

game.name: The Rusty Sword: Vanguard Island

With the aid of a skill tree that improves ship equipment, health, shields and the Nano Probe's arsenal of upgradeable weapons, players must successfully navigate through hordes of deadly pathogens to destroy the disease's pseudo-DNA as it twines perilously on its endless path to infection.

game.name: Turrican Flashback
game.desc: Turrican Flashback is a collection of four classic Turrican games, including Turrican, Turrican II: The Final Fight, Mega Turrican, and Super Turrican, remastered with enhanced graphics and sound.

game.desc: Vengeful Guardian Moonrider is an action-packed side-scrolling game that follows the story of a guardian on a mission to rid the world of evil. With challenging levels and fast-paced gameplay, players must fight off waves of enemies using a variety of weapons and abilities. Along the way, they'll uncover the truth about the guardian's past and the true nature of their enemies.

game.name: Verdict Guilty
game.desc: Verdict Guilty is an old school arcade style game, mixing the simplistic gameplay of the original Double Dragon and Final Fight games with modern graphics.

game.name: Void Prison
game.desc: Enter a sci-fi universe where you play as a prisoner in a maximum security space prison. Fight, loot, and craft your way through randomly generated levels as you try to escape.

game.name: Vostok Inc
game.desc: Vostok Inc. is a casual game about exploring space, managing a corporation, and making money. Players take on the role of a budding space entrepreneur, with the goal of becoming the richest person in the galaxy. Explore distant planets, build factories, mine resources, and discover new technologies to expand your empire and increase your profits.

game.name: Warhammer 40K Shootas Blood and Teef
game.desc: Take on the role of an Ork and fight your way through various levels filled with enemies and bosses. Upgrade your weapons and abilities to become even stronger and overcome the challenges ahead.

game.name: Warp 7
game.desc: Warp 7 is a fast-paced arcade-style space shooter game where players must navigate through hazardous environments and defeat waves of enemy spacecraft. With multiple ship types, upgradable weapons, and intense boss battles, Warp 7 offers an exciting gameplay experience for fans of the genre.

game.name: Warp Drive
game.desc: Warp Drive is a fast-paced arcade-style racing game that lets you drive, drift, jump, and teleport your way to victory.

game.name: Watcher Chronicles
game.desc: Watcher Chronicles is a action-packed RPG set in a dark and dangerous fantasy world where you take on the role of a Watcher, a guardian sworn to protect the land from evil. Journey through the realm, battle fierce monsters, and uncover the secrets of the dark forces threatening the land.

game.name: Wavecade
game.desc: Wavecade is an action-packed arcade-style shooter that challenges you to fight off hordes of space-themed enemies across multiple waves. With a variety of power-ups and upgrades at your disposal, you'll need to rely on your wits and reflexes to survive the relentless onslaught.

game.name: Western 1849 Reloaded
game.desc: Step into the boots of a lone sharpshooter in the Wild West.

game.name: Wife Quest
game.desc: Join our hero in his epic quest to find a wife! Explore a vast world filled with danger and romance, and meet potential mates along the way. Will you be able to find true love?

game.name: Wild West Crops
game.desc: Grow crops and raise animals on the farm in the Wild West. Trade your goods and participate in competitions to become the best farmer in town!

game.name: Will You Snail
game.desc: Join Snail and his friends on a daring adventure across a variety of environments in this charming puzzle-platformer. Use Snail's unique abilities, including stretching and retracting his neck, to navigate through obstacles and solve puzzles. With colorful graphics, catchy music, and intuitive controls, Will You Snail is a fun and engaging game for all ages.

game.name: Wind of Shuriken
game.desc: Wind of Shuriken is an action-packed platformer game that takes you on an epic adventure through ancient Japan. As a ninja warrior, you must use your shuriken throwing skills and swift movements to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles. With multiple levels and challenging boss fights, Wind of Shuriken will put your skills to the test. Are you ready to embark on this thrilling journey?

game.name: Windjammers 2
game.desc: Windjammers 2 is the next chapter of the classic arcade game, Windjammers. It features enhanced gameplay mechanics, new stages, and a revamped online system.

game.name: Wings of Bluestar
game.desc: Wings of Bluestar is a retro-style shoot 'em up game inspired by the arcade games of the 80s and 90s. Players pilot a spaceship through levels filled with enemies and obstacles, collecting power-ups and defeating bosses along the way. The game features classic 2D pixel art graphics and a thumping chiptune soundtrack, providing a nostalgic trip down memory lane for fans of classic shoot 'em up games.

game.name: Wizorb
game.desc: Breakout-style action RPG with retro pixel art visuals and a magical storyline. Players control the wizard, Cyrus, and must use their magic to defeat enemies and break through walls to progress through levels.

game.name: Worm Run
game.desc: In Worm Run, you play as Zeke Tallahassee, a space janitor on a mission to clean up the galaxy's biggest and slimiest mess. But things take a turn when a giant space worm chases after Zeke through the hazardous asteroid fields. Players must outrun the worm while avoiding obstacles, collecting gems, and using power-ups to gain an advantage. With challenging gameplay, fun retro graphics, and a catchy soundtrack, Worm Run is a thrilling and addictive experience for fans of endless runners and arcade-style games.

game.name: WWII Tank Battle Arena
game.desc: Get ready for intense tank battles in WWII Tank Battle Arena! Take on other players in multiplayer mode or go solo in single player mode. Choose your tank and customize it with different weapons and skins. Fight your way through different arenas and prove your tank skills. Are you ready for the ultimate tank battle?

game.name: Xeodrifter
game.desc: Xeodrifter is an action-packed, exploration game with a retro aesthetic. Blast your way through alien landscapes, discover new planets, and upgrade your abilities to take on new challenges.

game.name: X-Morph Defense
game.desc: X-Morph Defense is a unique fusion of top-down shooter and tower defense strategy. You are the X-Morph - an alien species that invades Earth to harvest its resources and terraform the surface. Strategize in the build mode by carefully selecting various types of alien towers or throw yourself right into the heat of the battle.

game.name: Young Souls
game.desc: As orphans, Jenn and Tristan's life path brought them to a mysterious scientist, who took them in and cared for them as his own children. But one day, he disappeared under very odd circumstances. While searching desperately for him, the duo found a hidden cellar and the Moon Gate portal, transporting them to a dangerous parallel world where goblins thrive.Your adventure begins as you fight to bridge these two very different worlds.FeaturesPlay a dynamic and deep side-scrolling RPG beatem up as Jenn and Tristan, solo or in co-op, as you explore the four unique biomes of the goblins' twisted world and the stylish world of the humans. Customise your combat gear by unlocking and upgrading hundreds of weapons, armour sets and accessories, to save the world as you know it.Unlock unexpected story paths as you fight your way through dozens of epic dungeons, hordes of enemies and over 20 fearsome bosses in the goblin realm. Young Souls combines the classic beatem up and story-rich role-playing genres through a beautifully crafted story, and in a world crafted with stunning art direction.

game.name: ZeroRanger
game.desc: ZeroRanger is a 2D shoot 'em up with a strong focus on storytelling and progressing through levels with a unique scoring system. Players control a lone spaceship as they battle through hordes of enemy ships and colossal bosses, using a variety of weapons and abilities to take them down. The game features stunning pixel art graphics, an epic soundtrack, and a challenging but rewarding gameplay experience.

game.name: Zombie Hill Race
game.desc: Survive the zombie apocalypse by racing through hordes of undead in Zombie Hill Race! Upgrade your car, unlock new vehicles and weapons, and blast your way through endless waves of zombies.

game.name: Zombies ruined my day
game.desc: Zombies Ruined My Day is a fast-paced action game where you play as a survivor fighting off waves of zombies. With a variety of weapons and power-ups, you must defend yourself and survive for as long as possible.

game.name: Beholder 3
game.desc: Beholder 3 is a strategic simulation game where you play as a landlord in a dystopian world. You must spy on your tenants, make difficult moral decisions, and ultimately decide whether to side with the government or the rebellion.

game.name: AvoCuddle
game.desc: AvoCuddle is a co-op puzzle-platformer game where two players take on the roles of a pair of avocado halves trying to find each other.

game.name: Blossom Tales II: The Minotaur Prince
game.desc: Blossom Tales II: The Minotaur Prince is an action-adventure game with elements of puzzle-solving and exploration. Join Lily, the knight of the Rose Guard, on a quest to rescue the prince of Blossom Kingdom from the clutches of the evil Minotaur.

game.name: Bot Gaiden
game.desc: Bot Gaiden is an action-packed platformer that combines a retro look with modern features, such as a level editor, character customization, and online leaderboards. You play as a robot who must save the world from an evil artificial intelligence, using a variety of weapons and gadgets to fight enemies and solve puzzles.

game.name: C.A.R.L.
game.desc: Join C.A.R.L. in his quest for knowledge and adventure!

game.name: Caverns of Mars Recharged
game.desc: Caverns of Mars Recharged is a modern take on the classic 8-bit game Caverns of Mars. You are a lone space marine tasked with exploring the treacherous caverns of Mars to uncover the secrets of an ancient alien race.

game.name: Elta7
game.desc: Roguelike Demon City shooting game , In the future world, in order to resist the oppression of Skynet, the underground resistance army sent the intelligent flight aircraft Elta 7 to obtain the energy chip and control the energy source to destroy Skynet and make the world free again. The game is played by roguelike + demon city. It designs many operations such as weapons, equipment, chip buff, a variety of secondary weapons, weapon protection bonus and upgrade. The main weapons, secondary weapons and long-range weapons are freely combined, with complex and diverse terrain and fierce Skynet enemy.

game.name: From Space
game.desc: That's no bubblegum army, that's an endless horde of menacingly pink aliens taking over our planet! Enough sweet talk, grab your gear, we need you and your squad to defeat the pink pests!YOUR MISSION: Liberate Earth from the Alien horde! MISSION TOP Squad Up!While you can play From Space solo (if you're brave enough) you'd be wise to invite some friends to help you out. With online play you can create a four-person squad. Look, there's a lot of those pink pests out there so the more people, the better. Oh, and with a squad, you'll have some witnessess to tell everyone how awesome you are. It's basically a win-win scenario. MISSION TIP Shoot, Explode and Stab With a variety of weapons (Rocket Launchers, Miniguns, Flamethrowers and more!) there;s no excuse not to annihilate those aliens! Build your ideal spec and use tactical items such as grenades and mines, or slow down the hordes with barbed wire and machinegun turrets. Remember to scavenge the world for loot, you'll need it! MISSION TIP You;re special, so pick your specialist skill! No matter what type of player you are, there;s a wide range of characters in From Space's roster, each with their own unique ability and weapons. Find the perfect balance with your friends as you build the ultimate super squad. MISSION TIP Don;t just stand there, Level-up! As you level-up, you;ll be able to attach special perks to your character, helping you to master the art of destroying aliens. You'll need to find ways to combat increasingly more powerful aliens, and perks will help you accomplish all of your pink alien squashing dreams. Need to rethink your strategy? No problem! We like innovators! Perks can be swapped around, even between your squad! MISSION TIP 5 The apocalypse has never been so much fun... so have fun! We;re going to level with you... an alien threat is terrifying, terrifyingly fun! Look, the world is already pretty beat up as it is. Who's going to notice if you cause a little bit more destruction while saving the day? People have insurance it's fine...

game.name: Galactic Invasion
game.desc: Galactic Invasion is an exciting new arcade space shooter game that offers players a thrilling ride through the galaxy. With multiple levels, power-ups, and challenging enemies, this game is sure to keep players engaged for hours.

game.name: Ganryu 2 - Hakuma Kojiro
game.desc: Ganryu 2 - Hakuma Kojiro is a 2D fighting game released in 1995 by Visco Corporation. The game features 10 playable characters and various game modes including arcade mode, versus mode, and survival mode. The game is known for its unique parrying system and fast-paced gameplay.

game.name: Geometric Feel the Beats
game.desc: Experience a musical adventure in Geometric Feel the Beats! Explore an otherworldly realm filled with rhythmic challenges and vibrant visuals. Move to the beat, avoid obstacles, and unlock new music as you progress through each level. With intuitive controls, addictive gameplay, and a wide variety of tracks to choose from, Geometric Feel the Beats will keep you grooving for hours on end.

game.name: Live Factory
game.desc: Action-adventure platformer. Great graphics. Explore the underground factory! Explore an underground factory hidden from eyes, filled with dangers, secrets and spatial puzzles. Use your wits and reaction to reveal all the secrets! Excellent 3D graphics and music will immerse you in the atmosphere at their best. Responsive controls will help you to run away from trouble and make accurate jumps to the intended goal. Features: Interesting gameplay Unusual visual style and beautiful 3D graphics New game mechanics and situations during your passing through Game made with a soul

game.name: Neodori Forever
game.desc: Drift like hell to outrun the competition! Collect power ups and coins on the way to expand your car collection! Neodori Forever is a retro arcade racing game inspired by the beloved old classics! Includes 5 game modes: Odyssey: race in each world zone to reach the finish line; Night Ride: mess with the Mafia; Endless Drive: explore all the world zones and ride at your pace; Rival Rush: challenge different opponents to earn a spot on top; Zen: just drive and chill. Features: randomly generated levels - never play the same track twice!; 25+ unique unlockable cars!; 11+ unique environments; a colorful cast of rivals; amospheric synthwave soundtrack. Fasten your seatbelt, step on the gas and drive!

game.name: NeverAwake
game.desc: A girl who never wakes up. She has been fighting monsters in her dreams..."NeverAwake" is a nightmarish twin-stick shooter with a unique worldview and original game rules. The girl fights against vegetables, dogs, school friends, and other things she hates. What does the girl see at the end of the battle? And will she be able to wake up? About NeverAwake "NeverAwake" has a unique worldview with its high quality hand-drawn graphics and beautiful animations.The enemies are not demons...but vegetables and dentists that the girl hates.Things and creatures that everyone has had a bad experience with at one time or another become monsters and attack the protagonist "Rem".With over 80 levels, dozens of bosses, and a unique gameplay system that allows players to retry many levels, NeverAwake is suitable for both beginner shooters and experts.Combine a multitude of weapons and accessories to fight off the monsters in your nightmares.The ending of this title will change depending on the player's dedication.Please play and see what the girl sees at the end of the battle.Features Kick the veggies, dentists, and other monsters out of the way and blow away the painful memories of your childhood! A unique world view set in the "inside of a girl's nightmare" Beautiful hand-drawn graphics and animations Unique game rules and high retryability Fast-paced gameplay and powerful boss battles More than 80 levels and dozens of tricky bosses Numerous weapons and accessories, and builds that combine them Great storytelling and multiple endings

game.name: PigShip and the Giant Wolf
game.desc: In PigShip and the Giant Wolf, you will help a little piglet save his brothers from the Wolf Army and defeat them. Are you ready for a classic Shoot 'em up? Use the online ranking to compare your best scores with those of friends and players around the world. - Classic arcade with magnificent pixel art. - Enemy-filled levels and huge final bosses. - Online ranking in the Bones Mode. - Level up system.
game.developer: Pixel Bones Studio, Super PowerUp Games, SOCIEDAD LIMITADA

game.name: Road of Death
game.desc: Survive the apocalypse and escape the deadly virus by driving on the dangerous and deserted roads. Collect resources and upgrade your vehicle to fight off zombies and other survivors. Will you be able to make it to the safe zone?

game.name: Rob Riches
game.desc: Rob Riches is a zen puzzle adventure where you explore ancient temples, solve their mysteries, and collect treasure all while delving deep into the Mesoamerican jungle, braving the cold heart of the Norse temple, and exploring the tomb beneath the scorching sands. Your quest is to gather all the coins by solving turn-based traps and mechanics in Sokoban style puzzles to unlock the path forward, and find the ultra-secret red coins. Each temple has its own set of unique and handcrafted puzzles to be solved, challenging you to improve your best solutions with the step counter, and uncover hidden secrets along the way. Be careful! Each temple also has its own set of traps and dangers you must overcome, but with the undo button, you can easily backtrack and plan ahead to avoid making a fatal mistake. As you delve further, the challenges become progressively more difficult, truly testing your puzzle solving skills, and rewarding you with each world's great treasure - which belongs in a museum!

game.name: Rooftop Renegade
game.desc: Rooftop Renegade is a fast-paced arcade-style game that takes place on the rooftops of a bustling city. Play as a daring parkour expert and run, jump, slide, and swing your way through the urban landscape while avoiding obstacles and enemies. With simple yet challenging gameplay, Rooftop Renegade is easy to pick up but difficult to master. The game features procedurally generated levels, so no two runs are ever the same. Collect coins along the way to unlock new characters, each with their own unique abilities. But beware, the city is filled with dangers - from obstacles like construction cranes and satellite dishes to enemies like security guards and attack dogs. Use your quick reflexes and parkour skills to navigate the rooftops and evade capture. Rooftop Renegade is the ultimate test of your speed, agility, and precision. Can you master the city's skyline and become the ultimate Rooftop Renegade?

game.name: Ruggnar
game.desc: Help Ruggnar explore gloomy places with his bag and a few candles as his sole equipment. It's a dwarf's story! As the veins of his city are depleted and the valley is deserted of its inhabitants, rumors of taverns come to Ruggnar's ears. Abandoned places contain incredible treasures that are just waiting to be picked up. Equipped with his bag and a few candles, he goes on an adventure to make his fortune! Ruggnar has a limited amount of candles to help him in these dark places. Help him manage his supply. Seeing the path ahead of you, activating certain mechanisms, or simply lighting up: it's up to you to find the perfect use for each candle! And if you throw one, remember to pick it up. It might come in useful soon! There are no enemies to kill here, but many traps are in your way. Hidden by the darkness, you may find yourself face to face with an axe, a fireball, or other nasty things. Don't worry, move carefully, use your candles, and everything will be fine. After all, Ruggnar is very agile for a dwarf and he gets up quite easily after an accident. Observe your surroundings, listen to the noises around you, throw your candles. The traps are there. It's up to you to avoid them! Throughout your journey, unlock new abilities. Visit the merchant to learn the secrets contained in ancient grimoires to improve your candles and equipment or to buy the latest items in stock. Need a change? Many beard dyes, armors, and helmets are hidden. Find them and create your own style! But that's not all! Explore every corner with smooth controls, experience the hand-forged story mode, and enjoy the procedural generation that extends the gameplay. Discover the story behind this humorous adventure and listen to the voice talents of Pierre-Alain de Garrigues (PADG, French voice-over) and Jordan Harrelson (English voice-over) as they lend their talents to Ruggnar so he can swear louder and louder!

game.name: Rumble Sus
game.desc: Rumble Sus is a fast-paced social deduction party game that pits Innocents against Traitors. Up to eight local players can join in the chaotic fun, but Nintendo Switch Lite users will require extra vibrating-supporting controllers for local multiplayer mode. At the beginning of the game, players learn their identity by whether or not their controller is rumbling, all without the others knowing. Once the game starts, Traitors need to find teammates and try to defeat all the Innocents without being exposed. Meanwhile, Innocents need to utilize items on the map and their wit to find dubious players and defeat all the Traitors. Use a radar and feel the rumble to detect Traitors. There's no need to vote, punch, or bomb your enemy directly. Teamwork can be the key to winning, but it can also destroy friendships. Pick up your controller and have a chaotic game full of laughter and suspicion with your friends!

game.name: RUNOUT
game.desc: RUNOUT is a dynamic runner-platformer with logical riddles set in a cyberpunk future. Players are constantly running, but when they collide with obstacles, they turn in the opposite direction. The game mechanics involve using abilities such as jumping, shooting, speeding up, and slowing down time to pass the levels. In the game, a hacker attack on the servers of the corporation 'MFS', which produces exoskeletons, results in the death of most of the carriers of exoskeletons. As the story unfolds, the player must find the culprit behind the sinister plot and save the world.Features: Single-player and two-player local co-op mode, different unlockable characters, two difficulties: choose the direction you run to or only turn when you find a wall, platform puzzles while running, use different abilities (shoot, speed up, slow down time), suspenseful cutscenes, cyberpunk visual aesthetic, and synthwave soundtrack.

game.name: Sentry Paragon
game.desc: Embark on a mission to save the galaxy from an alien invasion in this action-packed shooter game. Upgrade your weapons and abilities as you travel through the stars and battle enemy ships.

game.name: Simple Mini Golf 3D
game.desc: Experience a fun and challenging game of mini golf in 3D! Play through multiple levels with different themes and obstacles to overcome. Aim carefully and master the power of your swing to get a hole in one!

game.name: Slaycation Paradise
game.desc: Slay away your worries with Twin-Stick action mixed with Tower Defence as you visit the end-of-world scenarios of your dreams! SLAYCATION PARADISE - BOOK YOUR WASTELAND VACATION. Nestled deep in the heart of the galaxy, our state-of-the-art facility at Slaycation Paradise offers exclusive access to leisurely slaying activities for all warp travellers looking to get away from the daily grind. Explore our beautiful and chaotic destinations filled with an array of monsters intent on your demise. Slay away your worries and have the time of your life as the world around you withers and dies!VISIT OUR UNIQUE AND EXOTIC APOCALYPTIC LOCATIONS. Slaycation Paradise;s unique inter-dimensional portals offer an enticing selection of alternate Earth annihilation scenarios for you and your family to enjoy. Marvel at stunning vistas as worlds die in fiery hellscapes. Dangle your toes in rivers of blood while sipping on a margarita. *For that impending end of the universe' feeling, there's nothing like Slaycation Paradise. Come on in, the slaughter's lovely!*Use of heavy weapons while under the influence of alcohol is not recommended.BE CREATIVE AND TAILOR YOUR VERY OWN TOWER DEFENCE SET-UP. Free to all visitors is the simply swell Construction Assembly Turret (C.A.T. kit), providing custom defence structures anywhere you like.
